Texts.Chs: *饱嗝儿*
Texts.Eng: *BURP*
*HIC*

Texts.Chs: *嗝*。免费啤酒？
Texts.Eng: *HIC*. Free beer?
*Hi, uh. *HIC*.
... *BURP*

Texts.Chs: <令人不知所云的废话>
Texts.Eng: <unintelligible gibberish>

Texts.Chs: <令人不知所云的废话>
Texts.Eng: <untillegible gibberish>

Texts.Chs: 少嗦一点话，多搞一点快落，白脱！
Texts.Eng: A li'l lesh covversation, a li'l more 'nebriation, pleash!

Texts.Chs: 以金星之名起誓，你是我最好的朋友！
Texts.Eng: By Venush, yer me besht friend I shweear!

Texts.Chs: 嗝呃呃呃呃！
Texts.Eng: Caaaw!

Texts.Chs: 等你酒醒了再给我打电话。谢谢，欢迎再次光临！
Texts.Eng: Call me when you're sober. Thank you, come again!

Texts.Chs: 你能把水果和蔬菜放在你的罐子里，酿成美酒吗？
Texts.Eng: Can you turn fruit and veggiesh unto boozhe in that can of yoursh, right?

Texts.Chs: 不能-*嗝*-对你梦中情人唠叨吗？没有拉皮条的气垫车吗？为什么不多整点啤酒？
Texts.Eng: Can't sh-- *HIC* --nag the mate of your dreamsh? ain't got a pimped out hoverbike? why not drink more beer?

Texts.Chs: 恰查拉卡！
Texts.Eng: Chachalacaaa!

Texts.Chs: 检查他们的钱包！也许他们有像素...整来喝点啤酒！
Texts.Eng: Check their wallets! maybe they've got Pixels for ... beer!

Texts.Chs: 过来吧年轻的美人，来把我放倒！
Texts.Eng: Come 'ere me young laddie, and lay me down!

Texts.Chs: 回来吧伙计，我是你最好的朋友，真的！
Texts.Eng: Come back matey, I'm your besht friend. Honesht!

Texts.Chs: 乖乖，你们都是锡制的，没有啤酒*嗝*这一点也不好！
Texts.Eng: Dangit, you're all tin and no beer *HIC* Ain't no good at all!

Texts.Chs: 亲爱嘚，我希望我们能脚环一下电话号码！
Texts.Eng: Darn, we wash about to share phone numbersh!

Texts.Chs: 你刚扒了什么东西吗？
Texts.Eng: Did ya jusht nick shome-thing?

Texts.Chs: 你只管瞪大眼睛看着我喝，我赌上我的——*打嗝儿*
Texts.Eng: Drink to me only with thine eyesh, and I will pledge with-- *BURP*

Texts.Chs: 不知道你说什么“不偷东西”，但你把它运转的比这里更差！
Texts.Eng: Dunno what yer saysh 'bout not shtealin', but you spin it poorer than this here room doesh!

Texts.Chs: 足够的草根汽水，只要给我再来一点蜂蜜——*打嗝儿*
Texts.Eng: Enough with the root pop shtick, jusht gimme anuvver bee--*BURP*

Texts.Chs: 你有没有在喝啤酒后试过呼吸火焰？
Texts.Eng: Ever tried to breathe fire after drinkin' beer?

Texts.Chs: 有没有想过像我这样一个酒鬼会干些什么？
Texts.Eng: Ever wonder what is a place like me doing in a drunk like this?

Texts.Chs: 滚——*嗝*开，等你给我拿了啤酒再回来！
Texts.Eng: F--*HIC* off, and don't come back until you've got a beer for me!

Texts.Chs: 首先，粉红*嗝*——长鼻怪。现在开始谈论雪怪*打嗝儿*下一次谈什么？
Texts.Eng: Firsht, pink *HIC* --effalumpsh. Now talking yetish *BURP* What next?

Texts.Chs: 毛茸茸软绵绵！
Texts.Eng: Fuzzy wuzzy!

Texts.Chs: 你好，约翰·巴雷科恩！
Texts.Eng: Hello there, John Barleycorn!

Texts.Chs: 救命！快来个人救我。还有我的啤酒，但是先救救我的啤酒！
Texts.Eng: Help! someone save me. And my beer. But save the beer first!

Texts.Chs: 这是一只烤——*嗝*大猿人，还有它的榴弹发射器，呜呼！*打嗝儿*
Texts.Eng: Here's a toasht to *HIC*--ing Big Ape, and hish grenade launcher, woo hoo! *BURP*

Texts.Chs: 给你房租。现在把我的酒留给我吧，你这个酒鬼！
Texts.Eng: Here'sh your rent. Now leave me to me booze, you lush!

Texts.Chs: 在这里为美好的敌酋干杯!
Texts.Eng: Heresh anuvver toasht to good ol' Earff!

Texts.Chs: 嘿，离我的啤酒*！！！嗝！！！*远点！
Texts.Eng: Hey, shtay away from m-*!!!HIC!!!* beer!

Texts.Chs: 嗯，他们说美酒让人看起来更漂亮，但我从来没有见过任何人如泥一样丑陋。
Texts.Eng: Hmmm, they shayse boozhe makesh people look prettier, but I've never sheen anyone sho ugly ash ya.

Texts.Chs: 我*嗝*和你无话*嗝*可说。
Texts.Eng: I *HIC* nothing to *BURP* to you.

Texts.Chs: 我可能喝得烂醉如泥，但你会冷冰冰地死去。
Texts.Eng: I may be blind drunk, but yer jusht shtone cold and dead.

Texts.Chs: 我可以如领主那般醉倒，但你却只能——*嗝*——喝得烂醉如泥！
Texts.Eng: I may be drunk ash a lord, but youshe sh--*HIC*--tty ash a shtinking drunk!

Texts.Chs: 我现在可能喝醉了，但到了早上我会清醒的，不过你还是很难看。
Texts.Eng: I may be drunk now but in the morning I'll be sober and yoush still be ugly.

Texts.Chs: 干完这票我需要需来一瓶草根汽水。不要啤酒.等等，我刚才说了啥？
Texts.Eng: I need a glass o' root pop after all that. Not beer. Wait, what did I jusht say?

Texts.Chs: 我告诉过你!
Texts.Eng: I taw dat!

Texts.Chs: 我是个吝啬的酒鬼，我不想和别人一起喝！
Texts.Eng: I'm a pretty mean drunk, I don't wanna share the boozhe!

Texts.Chs: 如果醉酒使人看起来更漂亮，为什么你的丑得像个傻——*嗝*
Texts.Eng: If boozhe makesh people look prettier, why do yoush show ugly as f-- *HIC*

Texts.Chs: 如果你喝得像我一样醉，你会看到双倍的重影？还是三重？
Texts.Eng: If you're drunk ash I am, do you shee double? or triple?

Texts.Chs: 据说敌酋已经没了，但是这里依旧如初——*打嗝儿*
Texts.Eng: Itch shad that Earff ish gone, but at leasth there ish shtill-- *BURP*

Texts.Chs: 给我闭嘴，给我来更多的啤！
Texts.Eng: Jusht shut it and gimme more beer already!

Texts.Chs: 白酒？*打嗝儿*但我已经喝不下了——
Texts.Eng: Liquor? *BURP* but I hardly --

Texts.Chs: 看，这个地方叫做登峰酒吧。猜猜我接下来要去哪儿，我的伙计。
Texts.Eng: Looksh like thish plash ish reachin' peak beer. Guesh I'll be goin' away, my friend.

Texts.Chs: 朋友，泥好好好。
Texts.Eng: Matey, you duuu.

Texts.Chs: 呣...啤酒。
Texts.Eng: Mmmmmm.......beer.

Texts.Chs: 九十九瓶啤酒在墙上，九十九瓶在——*打嗝儿儿*
Texts.Eng: Nienty-nine bottless o' beer on the wall, ninety-nine bottles o' -- *BURP*

Texts.Chs: 现在我有一种想法，我希望有一天我不会醉到脸上灰暗。
Texts.Eng: Now theresh a shpirit I hope I won't be gettin' plashtered on shomeday.

Texts.Chs: 哦，哇，会说话的植物。我真是个网络钓鱼者！
Texts.Eng: Oh wow, a talking plant. I am so phished!
Oh, *HIC*.

Texts.Chs: 当人们喝醉的时候——*嗝*只有失败者才像泥这样！
Texts.Eng: Only looshers like ya p-- *HIC* on people when they're drunk!

Texts.Chs: 兄弟,麻烦你修好我的墙壁，别的人只是在其他日子给我喝啤酒。
Texts.Eng: Pleash fix up my walls guv, shumone just filched ma beer t'other day.

Texts.Chs: 拜托，把我的酒还我。你不会喜欢酒醒时的我的。
Texts.Eng: Pleash, put back my booszh. Yoush won't like me when I'm shober.

Texts.Chs: ROOOAARRRR!!
Texts.Eng: ROOOAARRRR!!

Texts.Chs: 畅快！*呼*
Texts.Eng: SMOOTH! *wheeze*

Texts.Chs: Shing right follol, the diddle all the dee *嗝*
Texts.Eng: Shing right follol, the diddle all the dee *HIC*

Texts.Chs: 有人刚刚喝掉了我的啤酒。是你吗？
Texts.Eng: Shumone just filched ma beer t'other day. Wash't you?

Texts.Chs: 你说我眼花缭乱？不，我没有—— *打嗝儿*
Texts.Eng: Sozzled, me? no, I'm no-- *BURP* -zzled.

Texts.Chs: 茶？耶, 一位王者怎能喝那个？
Texts.Eng: Tea? yeach, how do you *HIC* --king get drunk on that?

Texts.Chs: 兄弟，这是些好东西。想尝试一下吗？
Texts.Eng: That wash shum good shtuff, mon. Wanna try shum?

Texts.Chs: 这里没有足够的酒给另一个人了！
Texts.Eng: There jusht ain't enough boozhe in here fer anuvver!

Texts.Chs: 墙上只有九十九瓶啤酒了！
Texts.Eng: Theresh only nienty-eight bottlesh o' beer on me wall!

Texts.Chs: 你觉得自己很幸运，朋克？*！！！打嗝儿！！！*
Texts.Eng: Think ya feel lucky, punk? *!!!BURP!!!*

Texts.Chs: 这美好的世界,它一直在旋转*打嗝儿*
Texts.Eng: Thish fine o' world, it jusht keeps shpinnin' round *BURP*

Texts.Chs: 这个房间再不像过去那样旋转。让它恢复原状吧，拜托。
Texts.Eng: Thish room ish'nt shpinning ash it ushed to be. Fixh it, pleash.

Texts.Chs: 想知道如何做个好父母吗？简单*嗝*——不要有孩子然后给我把木乃伊果汁满上！
Texts.Eng: Wanna know how to be a good parent? eashy *HIC* - have no kidsh, and maxh out the mummy juice!

Texts.Chs: 当心了，我可是会醉拳的！
Texts.Eng: Watch out, I know drunken kung fu!

Texts.Chs: 我们煮了他们的鹅，是时候放松一下了！
Texts.Eng: We cooked their gooshe, iso t's time to looshe the joosh!

Texts.Chs: 六倍啤酒有什么好处？简单——这能阻止你买任何东西给她！
Texts.Eng: What are sixh beer good for? eashy - it shtops you from givin' a shi' 'bout everything!

Texts.Chs: 您是什么，莱西亚B的促进者 -- *打嗝儿* -- 火者？ *嗝*
Texts.Eng: What are you, a promoter for Letheia B -- *BURP* -- eriesh? *HIC*

Texts.Chs: 啥，哦，小偷！*打嗝儿*
Texts.Eng: What ho, thief! *BURP*

Texts.Chs: 什么地方是像你这样的人像这样喝酒的？
Texts.Eng: What is a place like you doing in a doink like this?

Texts.Chs: 当世界似乎像你喝了太多葡萄酒一样闪耀，那...我，我*嗝*猜...
Texts.Eng: When the world seems to shine like you've had too much wine, that'sh .... me, I *HIC* guess ...

Texts.Chs: 你为什么要把比萨奶酪绑在鼻子的末端？
Texts.Eng: Why have you a piesha cheeshe tied to the end of your noshe?

Texts.Chs: 为什么朗姆酒都消失了？请把它放回去。
Texts.Eng: Why is all the rum gone? pleash, put it back.

Texts.Chs: 有了金子和银子，我自然会支持你; 但在喝下酒之前我不会再说什么了。
Texts.Eng: With gold and shilver I'd shupport ye; but I'll shing no more 'til I get a drink.

Texts.Chs: 你们在闪光灯底下看起来都是绿色的。你们需要学习拿着自己的啤酒。
Texts.Eng: Y'allsh look green i' th' fash. Be needin' to learn t' hold yer beer.

Texts.Chs: 你是我最好的朋友。我当然闻到了。就像鱼。和醋。但主要像是，网络钓鱼者*嗝*
Texts.Eng: You're me besht friend matey. Sure shmell. Like fish. And vinegar. But moshtly, phish *HIC*

Texts.Chs: 你是我最好的伙计，但我是个吝啬的酒鬼！
Texts.Eng: You're me besht mate. And I'm a mean drunk!

Texts.Chs: 你们的种族太忧伤了，需要学会喝点啤酒。
Texts.Eng: Your kind mope too much, and need to learn to have a beer.

Texts.Chs: 你们星之子看起来的确像是白色的闪电！等等，是我喝过的白色闪电？
Texts.Eng: Your kind sure look like white lightning! wait, ish it the white lightning I've been drinkin'?

Texts.Chs: 你在跟我说话，伙计?
Texts.Eng: Yoush talkin' t''me, buddy?

Texts.Chs: 看，这个地方比金星表面还要干燥！最好给我找一个新的水洞。
Texts.Eng: Zooks, thish plash drier than the shurfash of Venush! besht get goin' to fin' me a new waterin' hole.
